about_the_game:
Greetings, Brave Typist!


Ah, so you’ve stumbled upon the Tower of Typing, have you? A curious choice, indeed. Most mortals shy away from such a challenge, but not you! No, you’ve got the spirit of a true wordsmith, ready to wield the power of the keyboard in ways that few can even fathom. Welcome to a world where words are mightier than swords, and where your typing skills shall be tested like never before!*

What Awaits You, Word Weaver:


Deep within this enchanted tower lies a series of trials designed to push even the most seasoned scribes to their limits. Each floor is teeming with vile creatures, all hungry for a taste of your magical prowess. But fear not! Your fingers are your wands, and with each keystroke, you shall conjure fireballs, summon shields, and unleash devastating spells to send your enemies back to the shadows from whence they came.

But beware! The higher you climb, the fiercer the foes become, and the trickier the words you’ll need to type. Do you have what it takes to reach the tower’s peak, where only the greatest of typists have dared to tread? Or will you falter, your fingers failing as the forces of darkness close in?

Why, You Ask? Because:


  • Typing is Magic: Forget wands and staffs—here, your keyboard is the ultimate magical tool. With each word you type, you’ll release powerful spells that can scorch, freeze, or even heal. The more accurate and swift your typing, the more potent your magic!
  • Creatures of the Quill: From mischievous imps to towering golems, the denizens of this tower are as varied as they are deadly. Each one has its own weaknesses, and only the sharpest of minds (and fingers) will discover how to exploit them.
  • Mystical Challenges: As you ascend, you’ll face increasingly difficult challenges. Traps that test your wits, words that twist your tongue, and enemies that grow ever more resilient. Only the most determined wordsmiths will emerge victorious.
  • Endless Enchantment: Whether you're a novice typist looking to hone your skills or a seasoned veteran of the keyboard wars, Tower of Typing offers endless replayability. Each run is different, with new words, new foes, and new strategies to master.

So, dear challenger, do you accept the quest? Will you conquer the Tower of Typing and prove that your words are more powerful than any wizard's spell? The journey is long, the tower is tall, and the enemies are fierce. But I sense greatness in you, a spark of true magic. Step forth and let your typing be your guide!

The Tower beckons… will you answer its call?

short_description: Tower of Typing is a roguelite typing game where you must type to cast spells. Explore the levels of Meghanim's tower, Unlock new heroes with special abilities, find powerful artifacts that will help your journey, and reach the tower's top to claim the wizard's ancient treasure!
